author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Viceroy Hotels' board meeting on September 14, 2017
description: we would like to bring to your kind notice that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, the 14th of September, 2017, at the registered office of the Company situated at Plot No. 20, Sector - I, Survey No. 64, 4th Floor, HUDA Techno Enclave, Hyderabad - 500 081, Telangana, India, inter-alia to consider and approve the Audited Financial Results (both
articleBody: we would like to bring to your kind notice that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, the 14th of September, 2017, at the registered office of the Company situated at Plot No. 20, Sector - I, Survey No. 64, 4th Floor, HUDA Techno Enclave, Hyderabad - 500 081, Telangana, India, inter-alia to consider and approve the Audited Financial Results (both Standalone &amp; Consolidated) for the First Quarter ended 30th June,  2017.  We would further like to bring to your kind notice that, as per the Company's Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading as framed under the Securities Exchange Board of India (Prevention of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company will remain closed from September  7,  2017 to September 15, 2017 (both days inclusive). The trading window shall remain open from September 16, 2017. Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Viceroy Hotels: Outcome of board meeting
description: Outcome of Board  Meeting  under  Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Regulations), 2015 ;Ref:Scrip ID:BSE:523796; NSE: VICEROY.The Board of Directors in their meeting held on 26.08.2017 commenced at 04.00 P.M. and concluded at 6.30 P.M.have inter-alia transacted the following items1.Approved the notice for calling the 52nd Annual General Meeting of the Company to be held on
articleBody: Outcome of Board  Meeting  under  Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Regulations), 2015 ;Ref:Scrip ID:BSE:523796; NSE: VICEROY.The Board of Directors in their meeting held on 26.08.2017 commenced at 04.00 P.M. and concluded at 6.30 P.M.have inter-alia transacted the following items1.Approved the notice for calling the 52nd Annual General Meeting of the Company to be held on Thursday, 28° September, 2017 at 11.00 A.M. at Hotel Marriott Convention Centre, and also approved the e-voting schedule and all other related matters 2.Approved the Directors Report for the financial year 2016-17 and all other annexures 3.Fixed the dates for the closure of register of members from Friday, 22nd September, 2017 to Thursday, 28th September, 2017 (both days inclusive).4.Appointed Ms. Chandra Babu Naidu &amp; Co., Chartered Accountants as the statutory auditors of the Company for a period of 5 (Five)years subject to the approval of Members meeting at the ensuing Annual General meetingSource : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Viceroy Hotels' board meeting to be held on July 31, 2017
description: The Board of Directors in their meeting held on July 31, 2017 and appointed Ms. Sonam Jaiswal as the Company Secretary of the Company with effect from July 31, 2017.
articleBody: The Board of Directors in their meeting  held on 31.07.2017 appointed Ms. Sonam Jaiswal as the Company Secretary of the Company with effect from 31.07.2017Source : BSE

headline: Viceroy Hotel appoints Rajesh Katragadda as an additional director

headline: Viceroy Hotels: Outcome of board meeting
description: Viceroy Hotels Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 30, 2016, inter alia, appointed Shri Devraj Govind Raj as Additional Director (Non-executive Independent Director) of the Company with immediate effect i.e. from May 30, 2016.
articleBody: Viceroy Hotels Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 30, 2016, inter alia, appointed Shri Devraj Govind Raj as Additional Director (Non-executive Independent Director) of the Company with immediate effect i.e. from May 30, 2016.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Viceroy Hotels

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Viceroy Hotels' board meeting on May 30, 2016
description: Viceroy Hotels Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on May 30, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the Audited Financial Results (both Standalone &amp; Consolidated) for the Fourth Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2016.
articleBody: Viceroy Hotels Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on May 30, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the Audited Financial Results (both Standalone &amp; Consolidated) for the Fourth Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2016.Further, that, as per the Company s Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading as framed under the Securities Exchange Board of India (Prevention of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company will remain closed from May 23, 2016 to June 01, 2016 (both days inclusive). The trading window shall remain open from June 02, 2016.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Viceroy Hotels

headline: Viceroy Hotels concludes deal with JW Marriatt
description: Viceroy Hotels Ltd has informed that the J.W. Marriatt deal had been concluded in favour of Ceebros Hotels Private Limited, Chennai as per the resolution passed by the shareholders and after reaching a settlement with the bankers of Chennai Project Division.
articleBody: Viceroy Hotels Ltd has informed BSE that the J.W. Marriatt deal had been concluded in favour of 'Ceebros Hotels Private Limited', Chennai as per the resolution passed by the shareholders and after reaching a settlement with the bankers of 'Chennai Project Division'.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Viceroy Hotels

headline: Viceroy Hotels consolidated Sep '13 sales at Rs 27.28 crore
description: Viceroy Hotels has reported a sales turnover of Rs 27.28 crore and a net loss of Rs 1.83 crore for the quarter ended Sep '13
articleBody: Viceroy Hotels has reported a consolidated sales turnover of Rs 27.28 crore and a net loss of Rs 1.83 crore for the quarter ended Sep '13.For the quarter ended Sep 2012 the consolidated sales turnover was Rs 27.55 crore and net loss was Rs 1.15 crore.Viceroy Hotels shares closed at 17.90 on November 05, 2013 (NSE) and has given -6.28% returns over the last 6 months and -27.24% over the last 12 months.Viceroy HotelsConsolidated Quarterly Results-------- in Rs.
